title: Skool.com Community Scraper
description: Extract posts, comments, and user data from Skool.com communities

startUrls.title: Community URLs
startUrls.description: List of Skool.com community URLs to scrape. You must be a member of these communities.

tab.title: Content Tab
tab.description: Which tab to scrape from the community

includeComments.title: Include Comments
includeComments.description: Whether to extract comments for each post (may significantly increase scraping time)

maxItems.title: Maximum Items
maxItems.description: Maximum number of posts to scrape per community (0 = unlimited)

maxConcurrency.title: Maximum Concurrency
maxConcurrency.description: Maximum number of concurrent requests (higher = faster but more resource intensive)

maxRequestRetries.title: Request Retries
maxRequestRetries.description: Maximum number of retries for failed requests

cookies.title: Authentication Cookies
cookies.description: Cookies exported from your browser after logging into Skool.com. Required for accessing community content. Use Cookie-Editor or EditThisCookie browser extension.

proxyConfig.title: Proxy Configuration
proxyConfig.description: Proxy settings for reliable scraping and avoiding IP blocks

requestDelay.title: Request Delay (seconds)
requestDelay.description: Delay between requests to mimic human behavior and avoid rate limiting

scrollDelay.title: Scroll Delay (seconds)
scrollDelay.description: Delay between scroll actions during pagination
